caption: Finally, the captain saw the houses in the jungle. He walked in and found bullet holes and casings everywhere. He walked into a room and found a phone, but it was already damaged. He immediately started repairing it. At the same time, the people of the aircraft company found a team of mercenaries to search for the plane. The captain fixed the phone and contacted the company. But the companyâ€™s operator thought it was a scam call and ignored it. Afterwards, he called his daughter and asked her to tell the company to rescue them. Suddenly, a separatist found the captain and they started to fight.
